question: Do you collect personal data?
answer:
I do not personally collect, store, or sell any individual user data. All analytics and advertising are handled by Google's SDKs under their Privacy Policy.

The dashboards I see only include aggregated, anonymous informationâ€”for example, how many people opened an app this week or which device models are crashing after a new release. You can always review the website privacy policy for the full breakdown of how data is processed and how you can opt out.
